p: Ficus sur Forssk is also known by other names as Ficus capensis Thunb, Ficus mallotocarpa Warb, and Ficus riparia (Miq. Fi.s sur L.). 5, 6 It belongs to the family of Moraceae and genus of ficus. The genus ficus consists of over 800 species. 7 In Ethiopia, this plant is known by different vernacular names as Shola in Amharic, Harbuu in Afan Oromo and Odakko in Sidamenya. 8
